{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Varesa's Orchard|It|Varesa's Orchard}} is located just outside of [["Collective of Plenty"]]. It belongs to [[Varesa]] and is guarded by her [[Tatankasaur]] companion, [[Vanana]]. The player gains access to it during the {{Quest|Orchard Repose}}.</p>}}

The orchard grows [[Apple]]s, [[Cacahuatl]], [[Grainfruit]], and [[Quenepa Berry|Quenepa Berries]]. It is also the only place where [[Red Berryshroom]]s can be found.

==="Fruits Aplenty" Machine===
This interactable is located on the southern side of the orchard.
* The player can prepare {{Item|Fruits Aplenty|x=1}} by submitting the required ingredients and hitting the front with a [[Tatankasaur]] or [[Collective of Plenty]] character.
